metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1104 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A Security Bypass vulnerability exists in the phpCAS 1.2.2 library from thejasig project due to the way proxying of services are managed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glpi - 0.84.3+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.84.3+dfsg.1-1').
moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
